Priestess of the Earth Chichirin:
Carna Maphral May the blessing of the Goddess of the Earth be with you.
The venerated Hero Lucien had enormous strength and willpower when he fought against the wicked Earth Worm Trasken, saving us Dwarves from the evil creature, Lucien once said,"I,Lucien,have always believed that the Goddess of the Earth is forever with me, Todays victory was only possible because of the blessing of the Goddess of the Earth!" Whatawiseremark!
We can learn a valuable lesson from Lucien, only those who truly believe in the Goddess's bounty will find what they seek! CarnaMaphra, I'm sure that you too will be blessed if you keep true to your faith.
Ask about the earth worm.
